name: RedPill
description: We created the RedPill Token ($RPILL) on the Ethereum blockchain, the currency of the Redpill Rebel Revolution. A token to generate support for the RedPill influencers and honour them by creating and delivering statues of themselves. Our digital economy will reward those who spread the word about our mission and contribute to it. Together we are powerful beyond measure and cannot be stopped. We will dominate all social platforms and even go on to create our decentralized streaming platform.
